docs.lead_paragraph: ALBANY, April 20. -- Some new points were brought out this afternoon in opposition to Gov. Black's Civil Service bill, at a hearing before the Assembly Judiciary Committee. A large delegation from Buffalo, headed by Charles B. Wheeler, Chairman of the Civil Service Commission of that city, was present, as were representatives of the boards from Albany and Rochester.

headline.main: HEARING ON GOV. BLACK'S BILL; Great Opposition Shown to the Measure by Prominent Citizens, Headed by Carl Schurz.
